name: Advanced Project
description: This course is designed to serve as a capstone course for VCC specialists. Students engage with advanced readings in the field and refine skills in critical analysis of selected topics in VCC. A major focus is the design and implementation of an advanced research project selected in consultation with an instructor. [24S]
prerequisites: VCC101H5/VCC 201H5 and completion of 13.0 credits. Open only to VCC specialists.
